thread.title: BRIEF-Mylan Expands Access To HIV/AIDS Medicines With Launch Of First Generic Sustiva Tablets

title: BRIEF-Mylan Expands Access To HIV/AIDS Medicines With Launch Of First Generic Sustiva Tablets

organizations.name: first generic sustiva tablets reuters staff  feb

text:
February 1, 2018 / 12:35 PM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-Mylan Expands Access To HIV/AIDS Medicines With Launch Of First Generic Sustiva Tablets Reuters Staff 
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Mylan Nv: 
* MYLAN EXPANDS ACCESS TO HIV/AIDS MEDICINES WITH LAUNCH OF FIRST GENERIC SUSTIVA® TABLETS 
* MYLAN - ANNOUNCED U.S. LAUNCH OF EFAVIRENZ TABLETS USP, 600 MG, FIRST GENERIC VERSION OF BRISTOL-MYERS’ SUSTIVA 
* MYLAN NV - CO ELIGIBLE FOR 180 DAYS OF GENERIC DRUG EXCLUSIVITY IN RELATION TO GENERIC SUSTIVA TABLETS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
